properties.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
properties.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued February 7 at 2:07PM PST until February 9 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph
expected. Waves 1 to 3 feet.

* WHERE...Pyramid Lake.

* WHEN...From 10 AM Saturday to 10 PM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone
to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until
conditions improve.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust may restrict visibility around
western Nevada.
properties.instruction:
Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a
sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing
boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

NWSheadline: LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM SATURDAY TO 10 PM PST SUNDAY FOR PYRAMID LAKE
